Class SessionContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • by.petropavlovskaja.pharmacy.controller.session.SessionContext
  • public final class SessionContext
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for processing the front requests commands. Has next properties: requestMethod, requestParameters and session
